19.text: Christmas University Challenge. Asking the questions, Jeremy Paxman.

28.text: Hello. We've seen 14 teams of distinguished graduates take part

33.text: in this Christmas series, and although there were seven winners,

37.text: obviously, only the four winners with the highest scores

41.text: are returning for the semifinals, which start tonight.

44.text: Now, one might think it'd occur to any team that mugging up

47.text: on the names of Santa's reindeer would be time well spent

58.text: and Cupid in bonus questions, that also had them wondering

69.text: from Christmas carols to Christmas cacti

71.text: and did themselves quite a few favours

73.text: with their speed on the buzzer.
